short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best super mario rider game on the internet!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join in a race in the world of mushrooms and magic stars, select and play with any of Mario's friends, Luigi, Toadette or Toad, help them get safely to the castles on each level to be one step closer to rescuing the beautiful princess from the dragon boss. 
You can also enjoy similar games listed on the game page.
